sentences.english: The work is published in the European Journal of Operational Research.

sentences.english: Mr Osborne also does much of the government’s political thinking.
sentences.chinese: 同时，许多政府的政治决策也是由他在运筹帷幄。

sentences.english: My own writing strategies of the world of knitting.
sentences.chinese: 我自己在文字编织的世界里运筹帷幄。

sentences.english: Operations Research, Game Theory, Fuzzy Decision Making, Financial Risk Management.
sentences.chinese: 运筹学，博弈论，模糊决策，金融风险管理。

sentences.english: But this isn't the economic success story that the White House is spinning.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这并不代表白宫通过运筹帷幄获得了经济胜局。

sentences.english: Using Learning Curve Model to Construct an Order Distribution Decision Supply System …
sentences.chinese: 以学习效应观点建构成衣业全球运筹订单分配决策。

sentences.english: Sixth, he anticipated and outsmarted the competition.
sentences.chinese: 第六，他运筹帷幄以智取胜。

sentences.english: Two people devise strategies among a bid tent of the access is really bad Be obtaining tooer numerous.
sentences.chinese: 两个人的运筹帷幄之道，实在是差得太多太多了。

sentences.english: I sincerely welcome your company's arrival will help you devised strategies Out of a thousand miles.
sentences.chinese: 我公司真诚欢迎您的到来，将帮你运筹帷幄决胜千里。

sentences.english: Strategy in broad sense means the overall or long term strategy and design of the war.
sentences.chinese: 广义上的战略则是指带全局性或长远性的运筹和谋划。

sentences.english: The name is standard in operations research theory.
sentences.chinese: 这个名字是运筹学理论中的标准术语。

sentences.english: He's a clever young man and knows how to play his cards well.
Actively promoting relations with the major countries.
sentences.chinese: 积极运筹与主要大国关系。

sentences.english: The timetabling problem is one of the most difficult problems in the field of operational research and combinatorial optimization.
sentences.chinese: 课程表问题是运筹学和组合优化中最难的问题之一。

sentences.english: I'm a firm believer that God has His hand in everything that happens.
sentences.chinese: 我坚决相信每一件事情都有上帝的手在其中运筹帷幄。

sentences.english: If you don't, here's a a brief practical explanation.
sentences.chinese: 如果不了解运筹学理论，下面是一个实际的解释。

military strategy/military tactics/originally refers to military classics Six Secret Teachings 六韜|六韬[Liu4 tao1] and Three Strategies 三略[San1 lu:e4]

to lead military operations with extraordinary skill

art of war/military strategy and tactics
to plan and consider/to reflect on one's best strategy
stratagem/scheme/shrewdness

"Six Secret Strategic Teachings" 六韜|六韬[Liu4 tao1] and "Three Strategies of Huang Shigong" 三略[San1 lu:e4], two of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1], attributed to Jiang Ziya 姜子牙[Jiang1 Zi3 ya2]
